text.div:
Task Stage Codes

Task Stage codes.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/task-stage defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
proposal proposalThe request is a recommendation or suggestion where there has not yet been any commitment to action
planned plannedThe request has a specific intention to be performed and may be scheduled but is not yet authorized to be performed
actionable actionableIndicates that the task is authorized and ready to be actioned

concept.definition: The request is a recommendation or suggestion where there has not yet been any commitment to action
The request has a specific intention to be performed and may be scheduled but is not yet authorized to be performed
Indicates that the task is authorized and ready to be actioned
